com.twitter.heron.scheduler.api

Class SchedulerStateManagerAdaptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.twitter.heron.scheduler.api.SchedulerStateManagerAdaptor
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Nullity.NullSchedulerStateManagerAdaptor

    public class SchedulerStateManagerAdaptor
extends java.lang.Object
    This file provides a Adaptor for Scheduler. It provides only the methods needed for Scheduler, and provides easier interfaces to invoke in Scheduler.
